definition: (of the sun) to shine on/to bask in (the sunshine)/to dry (clothes, grain etc) in the sun/(fig.) to expose and share (one's experiences and thoughts) on the Web (loanword from "share")/(coll.) to give the cold shoulder to
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
sun/day/date, day of the month
Korea
beautiful
to be in the sun (getting warm or sunbathing etc)/to put sth in the sun (e.g. to dry it)
(of the sun) to scorch/to expose to a scorching sun
to sunbathe/to tan/to get sunburnt/to expose unfair practices (on a consumer protection website)
to dry in the sun
to expose to strong sunlight
(idiom) to be exposed to the elements
scorched and drenched by sun and rain (idiom); suffer from exposure to the elements/weather-beaten
sunburn spots (on skin)
blueprint/to make a blueprint

sentences.english: After Sun Replenishing for Face and Décolleté.
Soothes and softens dry, irritated, chapped or sunburn skin.
sentences.chinese: 使乾燥，敏感，粗糙以及曬後的皮膚柔潤，富有彈性。

sentences.english: He wanted to sunbathe rather than swim.
sentences.chinese: 他寧願曬日光浴也不去游泳。

sentences.english: There were only a few dry bones left, bleached by the sun.
sentences.chinese: 一些被太陽曬得泛白的枯骨。

sentences.english: So the dishcloth to often take out, can destroy most bacteria.
sentences.chinese: 所以抹布要時常拿出來曬一下，就能消滅大部分細菌。

sentences.english: The hot sun made her exude sweat.
You need to get some sun.
I'll get the cast and go for sardines. Will you sit in the sun in the doorway?
sentences.chinese: 我拿魚網撈沙丁魚去。你坐在門口曬曬太陽可好？

sentences.english: The long , hot summer scorched the grass .
sentences.chinese: 炎熱的長夏曬枯了青草。

sentences.english: The sun is up. Time to get up.
sentences.chinese: 太陽都曬屁股啦，該起牀了。

sentences.english: You'd better get the milk before it sours in the sun.
sentences.chinese: 你最好把牛奶拿進來，以免太陽曬了變酸。

sentences.english: Recently, websites such as sohu.com, set up special sections for people to "divulge their salaries".
sentences.chinese: 近日，搜狐等網站設立了一些所謂的“曬工資”專區。

sentences.english: They were burnt brown with the summer sun.
sentences.chinese: 夏天的太陽把他們曬得黝黑。

sentences.english: Wanna get some U. V. s before we go home.
sentences.chinese: 回家前我想曬會兒太陽。

sentences.english: The dates have all dried up in the sun.
Gerald bronzed in the face and travel-stained from head to foot .
sentences.chinese: 傑勒德面孔曬得黝黑黝黑，從頭到腳風塵僕僕。
